content: Excellent points! Especially those regarding leadership. Steve was right: his most important “product” was the leadership team he built. And subsequently the teams his leaders built were just as important. I’m not sure that product exists anymore. When Ron Johnson left as head of retail, there was a change in store culture and focus as well. Store employees are as critical to Apple’s success as are its products and services. They are the face of Apple and its direct connection to customers. Apple really did change the world at one point and I hope it can again.
